title: Dazzling Diamond Crescent Pendant - Modern Tikkalu
materials: G Color). Crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: A contemporary take on traditional South Indian pendants. Features a crescent-shaped design adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. Delicate floral motifs and teardrop-shaped dangles add a touch of elegance and movement. Modern setting style ensures maximum brilliance and security of the stones.
colors: Rose Gold with sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and as a sophisticated addition to festive attire. Can also be worn to a Sangeet or Reception.
description: This exquisite diamond pendant seamlessly blends modern design with the elegance of South Indian jewelry. The rose gold adds a warm, romantic touch. The brilliant-cut diamonds guarantee exceptional sparkle. A versatile piece that can be paired with both traditional and contemporary outfits, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. Its timeless design and exceptional craftsmanship ensure it will be cherished for generations.
